metadata.description:
'crush' is another one of the many love songs I've written this year and one of my favorites so far. The song is inspired by my current fascination of hyperpop vocals and catchy vocal chop melodies. As someone who makes EDM most of the time, it's always a breath of fresh air to create something more simple (sometimes less is more when it comes to music production).

Written, recorded, produced, mixed, and mastered by me in my little bedroom studio.

lyrics.text:
You know that I've got a crush on you
Stuck on my heart
All the things you do
Loving the way that it feels brand new
I got a crush
I got a crush baby
All that I want is to run to you
Stuck on my heart like a new tattoo
I want you like a new pair of shoes
I've got a crush baby

I wanna spend all my time with you
Your voice is all that i listen to
Letting my guard down to see the view
I got a crush
I got a crush baby

I know you're already mine
But i needed to get something off my chest
I see the sky when I look in your eyes
and I just wanted you to know
I got a crush baby

metadata.name: crush #1
metadata.title: crush
